website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba Satellite Click 2 Pro P35W-B3226 hybrid detachable tablet has all the ingredients to be superb, but the recipe doesn't quite come together.
pros: Good performance, thanks to Intel Core i7 processor
cons: Some ports inaccessible with the tablet docked
Keyboard has very short key travel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Product is very high performance, but with bad body material, I bought it 1 month ago and its body is broken during daily use without any accident. I'm not satisfied about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hani Mohamed ElDakroury

customer_reviews.title: Item did not come as described and did not even work.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I purshased this laptop and the display never came on. I called Toshiba and gave them my serial number and was asked if I was aware that the product was refurbished. I then tried every step the rep gave me to get it working and nothing worked. I checked the box it came in for any indication that this was a refurbished product and it had a sticker on it with the model name and then *NEW* directly under it. Needless to say I am very disappointed with this because I was obviously deceived. I wish I could give this zero stars. To fellow buyers, please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Problems with keys and screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer and it started to present bubbles on the screen first 3 months being very carefully on its use. Later, it presented problems with some keys. The worst investment I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: MANUEL

customer_reviews.title: It looks this laptop has a great configuration. It was quick and bealtiful
customer_reviews.text: It looks this laptop has a great configuration. It was quick and bealtiful. But I had no time to experience it well. First it had a crack-like stain of dead pixels in the upper right corner of the monitor. Nothing that would make a big problem except of the keyboard. It worked only on a random way. I called Toshiba and had to return the item. However Toshiba assistance was excelent. One star for the frustation. Would give a 5 star if it worked fine and it had no crack-like stain of dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: rvivac

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was broke in less than a year. I've switched permanently to Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is damaged after 3 months of use. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstanding unit in all respects. Some ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding unit in all respects. Some of the on-line reviews were a little misleading; for example: there was comment about the weight of the detachable monitor being too much for the keyboard base - not an issue at all. Screen resolution, speed; all outstanding. The startup time is about 1.5 seconds. There were also odd comments about the keyboard; again, no issues from me. This was my first Toshiba but was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: T Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this laptop! The hardware, specifically the hinges and housing, are extremely cheap. They broke after 8 months of normal use. Toshiba support is not helpful at all and refused to repair (even if I paid for it). The motherboard also died after 6 months of use, but Toshiba did repair that... I've had nothing but issues with this laptop and Toshiba support. I only recommend buying this if you want it to turn into a $600 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: First 2 in1 and it really is versatile. Slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: First 2 in1 and it really is versatile. Slightly heavier than I expected but it's a BIG tablet. Does everything that a normal laptop or desktop does. Very fast and with the addition of Windows 10 it is even more friendly. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Like the way it removes from keyboard to become tablet
customer_reviews.text: So far meets my needs. Like the way it removes from keyboard to become tablet. Not a fan of the holdover concept although that looks like the way the product line is going.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service? NOT.
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible waste of money. There is a problem with the sound, a hardware problem, and I could not get the Toshiba support people to listen. They kept checking the software, and at one point I got a supervisor whose English was so bad I had to ask him to repeat himself. He would then repeat it angrily as if I were an idiot. Meanwhile, it was clear he DIDN'T EVEN KNOW WHAT PRODUCT HE WAS TESTING. The third time I called Toshiba, THEY'RE COMPUTER SYSTEM WAS DOWN. I am still waiting for a return call. I have three different case numbers. Folks, I have an $800 laptop sitting unused. Toshiba, get your act together.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Mostly parametrs perfects. But very heavy one parts up ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly parametrs perfects. But very heavy one parts up side how is disconnected. Very modern style. But for ultrabook heavy. Small solid state hard driver only 128 gb for this price. No likes: mass - heavy, volume - small hard drive. Other one all perfects.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Overall performance is good but build quality and usability is not up to the mark.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth spending $700+. Overall performance is good but build quality and usability is not up to the mark. Not satisfied with purchase and return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade and replacement to my 5 year old Dell desktop computer. The desktop confined us to the home office and this little gem allows us to use it all over the house. Plus, with the I-7 chip, it is amazingly fast!
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The right upper corner of the screen doesn't respond to the touch of my fingers like the rest of the screen 3
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived with the following problems: 1. There was a tiny crack in the screen that recently started to expand 2. The right upper corner of the screen doesn't respond to the touch of my fingers like the rest of the screen 3. The power light bulbs don't go off when I switch off the laptop except when the battery dies 4. The laptop vibrates suddenly and doesn't go off unless the laptop is closed
customer_reviews.author: asserhany

customer_reviews.title: The internet connection doesn't work after few minutes once you ...
customer_reviews.text: The internet connection doesn't work after few minutes once you start to use it, there is some message of Firewall.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Briceno

customer_reviews.title: waste
customer_reviews.text: Came with no operating system so in essence unusable. Although described as having Windows 8.1 waste
customer_reviews.author: R. Ambroise

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but the price dropped 150 USD after purchasing. .
customer_reviews.author: ramy barakat

customer_reviews.title: Too glitchy and poorly engineered.
customer_reviews.text: Really poorly engineered. Back in the late 90's, I bought my first Toshiba laptop and was very happy with the robustness of that machine but not this one. Immediately, screws holding the back of the case on began falling out. the right and left click buttons are loud and the software is glitchy during Microsoft updates. It has turned me off Toshiba forever. Factory support is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Celestialsailor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The hinges broke on the connection with the tablet portion. I am trying to find a way to use just the tablet, but Toshiba doesn't seem to make cases I could use. I've also noted when I use it in just tablet mode it quickly overheats. Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: great tablet - garbage keyboard-dock
customer_reviews.text: The tablet portion is great, the keyboard is very flimsy, unstable and delicate- mine broke by tilting the tablet in just one month and Toshiba support was garbage - non-resistant and phony - just like the product. Do yourself a favor and do not buy this. The keyboard dock is way to expensive to replace and I am sure it will break in a few days. Gave two star because of the good tablet portion.
customer_reviews.author: Mjchxz

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer if you are a Techie
customer_reviews.text: i have this exact computer but I bought mine from Best Buy I have had it for year and a half now on only one screw his phone up in the bottom of the keyboard other than that I haven't had any problems with the computer although I am a techie nerd so when my computer has a problem I know how to fix it right away all in all I love this computer it is the best one I've had so far
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was dead after less 2 years light use. I have tried all the suggestions from on-line (included Toshiba). It doesn't work and wont turn on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Liu

customer_reviews.title: A pathetic product from Toshiba
customer_reviews.text: A pathetic product from Toshiba, in just 6 months of use my couple of keys stopped working. How can Toshiba do such thing..so frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is very poor quality. I had the laptop for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Hardware is very poor quality. I had the laptop for a couple of years and It is falling apart piece by piece and fixing it is very expensive. First the hinges went off and today the start button just fell apart with just normal use.. I would expect better quality given the amount of money paid.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This has to be one of the worst engineered product I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor, run as fast as you can away from this thing. This has to be one of the worst engineered product I've seen. I guarantee you that the damned hinge will break on you.
customer_reviews.author: Scooty's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is so awful it's almost useless - unedited review to show you
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. The keyboard makes this computer useless. I have t constantly go back and fix keying errors (like letter not even showing up when I press them, or double letters showing up!). I did not edit this review for that very purpose- to show you what typing is like if you purchase this. How can they seriously mess up a keyboard so badly? Btw, my profession is in publishing so II type almosst 100% accurately and barely nneed to proofread my work ever. Until now. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emm

product_meta.title: Toshiba P35W-B3226 Click 2 Pro 13.3" FHD Touch 2-In-1 Ultrabook Laptop Intel i7-4510U 8GB Memory 128GB Solid State Drive Satin Gold
product_meta.description: Toshiba P35W-B3226 2-in-1 Convertible Touch-Screen Laptop: With a detachable touch-screen display, this laptop transforms into a highly portable tablet, so you can browse Web content and stay connected via social media wherever you go. A backlit keyboard facilitates typing in low-light conditions, letting you remain productive.
feature_bullets: 4th Gen Intel Core i7-4510U mobile processor Ultra-low-voltage platform. Dual-core, four-way processing provides maximum high-efficiency power to go. Intel Turbo Boost Technology delivers dynamic extra power when you need it.
Windows 8.1 operating system/2 USB 3.0 ports in the base/

13.3" touch screen for hands-on control Touch, tap, glide and make the most of Windows 8. TruBrite technology amps up color and clarity. IPS technology offers wide viewing angles. Full 1920 x 1080 HD resolution. Energy-efficient LED backlight.
Built-in HD webcam with dual microphones/Bluetooth 4.0 interface syncs with compatible devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars47 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
